reset_password.title: Reset Your Password
reset_password.instructions: Enter a new password to reset your password.
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been successfully reset! Redirecting to login...
reset_password.password_requirements: Minimum 8 characters with at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and one special character

auth.password_complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

errors.pageNotFoundMessage: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

errors.networkErrorMessage: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
errors.unauthorizedMessage: You don't have permission to access this page. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

project_permission.title: Project Permission Management
project_permission.description: Manage roles and permissions for each project. Create project-specific roles and assign them to users.

project_permission.select_project_description: Choose a project from the dropdown to view and manage its roles and permissions.

project_permission.select_role_to_manage: Select a role to manage permissions

project_permission.role_name_min_length: Role name must be at least 2 characters
project_permission.select_user_placeholder: Choose a user to assign roles
project_permission.roles_required: Please select at least one role
project_permission.no_roles_available: No roles available for this project. Please create roles first.
project_permission.delete_role_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{role}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all user assignments for this role.
